feed.title: Fort Good Hope - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Fort Good Hope
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 a.m. MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Good Hope Airport 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.9°C

Visibility: 1.6 km

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
